"Mission Pass":
"About the Mission Pass

The Mission Pass is a system that lets you earn rewards by raising your Tier.
When you complete special ARKS Missions called \"Tier Missions\", you will earn Stars, and when you have enough Stars your Tier will increase.

Mission Pass rewards include Normal Rewards and Gold Rewards.
・Normal Rewards
Rewards that can be obtained by all players.
・Gold Rewards
Rewards that can be obtained by consuming a Mission Pass Gold Ticket.

※You can get a Mission Pass Gold Ticket by purchasing it from the SG Shop or by buying a Premium Set."
